This game sucks, and is 1000% not worth it.

Now here me out. Imagine your parent buys you a new toy. The toy is fun to play with, and its perfect how it is. Then randomly one day that same parent takes that toy and adds a knife through the center. Now, you can't even play with it, it hurts to grab, and it destroys your other toys you have. You complain to your parents, and in turn, they add another knife and cut off the toys head. Now theres two knives, no head, the toy is an absolute dumpsterfire, and it just is not fun anymore. 

This is how this game is. BHVR is the parent, and instead of fixing actual issues, is just strapping another knife to the game, making it even more unplayable. 

BHVR is proof that literal monkeys throwing their own shit can make a popular game with a large fanbase. They simply do not listen to any input the community has. It is honestly at the point where there is absolutely no way this company isn't a social experiment that are purposefully trying to destroy this game. There are so many issues to complain about, BHVR has truly done an amazing job at making me feel badly about my self. Congratulations to this absolute hellspawn of a game and company for ruining the fun times and actually balanced mechanics that used to be in this game.

EDIT: Any shred of regret I had for uninstalling and leaving this review has left my body. Watching the most recent livestream, and hearing Patrick try and compare hockey to a video game made me visibly angry. Patrick, you are the most braindead dev I have ever met. If I am to do 5 gens myself, but get hooked one time and camped and die, that makes me a bad player? Yet the three other people who were hiding in lockers for all 5 gens that escaped are good? Seriously? 

I had a game where I was the only person dead, I had 23000 bp after. The other 3 people had a COMBINED 21000. However they all escaped, yet I died. Are they better than me? 

To BHVR, it is about time you get off your high horse and quit being egotistical and acknowledge that what you are doing is not working. There is a reason your player base has dropped almost 30% in the last 4 months. You have lost 21000 average players but still think that you are in the right. Absolutely the most pathetic excuse for a company I have ever seen.

Edit again: This game still sucks, mfs saw my review and decided to nerf every perk I enjoyed using. Patrick youre a bastard man

Edit #3:dear god this game is so unbelievably killer sided, good job on the anime skins to cover up how awful this game is
I really enjoy playing killer, and recommend this game to anyone who wants to be the bad guy

Game is absolutely infested with cheaters (force disconnects, "subtle" cheats like movement/progression speed increases etc), and the developers are seemingly actively inviting this and even banning people for bringing the issue up on their forums. I regret buying this game and I implore people interested in it to stay away until the devs pull their heads out of their rear ends, if they ever do.

Do you like slaughtering victims in a dark and eerie realm?
Or perhaps you like to dab on MFs that are trying to kill you, with some dank side checks?
Either way, would recommend if you have any idea of what a skill ceiling is.

If you don't, it will still be hell of a time if you play with friends as survivors, to be terrified as an experienced(or trash) killer guts you. You'll have the opportunity be the party member to laugh at your friends getting hung up on rusty meat hooks. It's the little moments like that the makes real friendships ;)
You could also be the one tripped, left behind to be mauled by the bear.
But no, maybe you're the compassionate hero to come back, and throw some sand in the killers eyes to give your comrade that brief moment to escape the enders grasp.

The role you play will be quickly determined while a knife wielding nut job is behind you. Who's only goal is to skin you and wear your skin as a sexy new hat. Only in this moment, will you know which you are.

Alternatively you could be getting to your killer roots. Sharpening your blades, perfecting your nightmares, oiling your chain saw.
Bathing in the blood of scrubs and cucks. Those who think they are slick, and are not already lost and  entombed in your realm.
Nothing but little play things for your unstoppable intent!(unless they have a under charged flash light).

Give it a shot.
Always more fun with friends.






...unless you play killer. In which case I would still recommend because it is still a better alternative killing people online, than coming home to kick your dog to release stress.
Do I recommend this game? No. Do I peer pressure all my friends into playing this game with me? Yes.

For once in a very very long time, I see a normal amount of strong things in this game compared to others.
After many years, DBD just received a massive balance patch, and the gave has never felt more fun.
No more dead hard, no more "Oh shit, I don't have borrowed time", natural slowdown added to every killer, and the giant grind of the game finally reduced, freeing up perk slots since they are no longer used for old farming perks.

This hasn't fixed the game, not by a long shot, Nurse still absolutely dominates the game, medkits are still broken strong, but it's the biggest step in the right direction I've ever seen this game take, and most importantly, it's a sign BHVR are finally willing to try big things to make their game better.

For once, I can recommend DbD, but it comes with an asterisk.
BHVR has been fucking up for years, and this update could be a "stopped clock is right twice a day" situation and then they'll go back to bad updates, but I'm optimistic that they're finally going to start risking things to make their game worth the money.

SO. On paper dbd could literally be the best asymmetrical horror multiplayer game ever but it suffers from A LOT of issues. Sadly it has no competition whatsoever and that probably impacts the way the devs approach the game. Many people are quitting this game and it makes me sad because I've played countless of hours on console too and it was my fav game ever. RN not so much, it's kinda frustrating to play (if you're alone at least) and that's probably the reason why many people quit, it's not so fun anymore.
I still recommend it because I cannot get over it, on a art level this game is insane, the original killers are stunning and interesting. The general lore is...FINE, if you like lovecraftian stuff ig it's okay lol, the killers backstories are insanely good tho and the gameplay is interesting indeed. You have fun if you don't play at high ranks basically SO YOU SHOULD BE FINE.

(ALSO APPARENTLY WE ARE GETTING PINHEADS VOICELINES BACK? That's pretty cool)

I just love this game I hope bhvr will step the f up and fix the issues and unbalancing in this game because to me it's still one of my fav games ever with endless potential.
would be a decent game if the balancing was better and the matchmaking wasn't absolute garbanzo
